37 namespace tile_interface {

39 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Enabler>
40 class Cast;

52 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
53 class Cast<Result, Arg,
54  std::enable_if_t<detail::has_conversion_operator_v<
55  Arg, madness::Future<Result>> ||
56  detail::is_convertible_v<Arg, Result>>> {
57  public:
58  typedef Result result_type;
59  typedef Arg argument_type;
60  static const constexpr bool is_nonblocking =
61  detail::has_conversion_operator_v<argument_type,
62  madness::Future<result_type>>;
63 
64  // basic type sanity checks
65  static_assert(std::is_same<result_type, std::decay_t<result_type>>::value,
66  "Cast<Result,Arg>: Result must be a non-const non-ref type");
67  static_assert(std::is_same<argument_type, std::decay_t<argument_type>>::value,
68  "Cast<Result,Arg>: Arg must be a non-const non-ref type");
69  static_assert(detail::has_conversion_operator_v<
70  argument_type, madness::Future<result_type>> ||
71  detail::is_convertible_v<argument_type, result_type>,
72  "Cast<Result,Arg> does not know how to construct Result or "
73  "Future<Result> from Arg");
74 
75  private:
76  template <typename Result_, typename Arg_,
77  typename = std::enable_if_t<
78  detail::is_convertible<std::decay_t<Arg_>, Result_>::value>>
79  static auto invoker(Arg_&& arg) {
80  auto exec = [](Arg_&& arg) {
81  return static_cast<Result_>(std::forward<Arg_>(arg));
82  };
83  return TiledArray::meta::invoke(exec, arg);
84  }
85  template <typename Result_, typename Arg_>
86  static auto invoker(
87  Arg_&& arg,
88  std::enable_if_t<detail::has_conversion_operator_v<
89  std::decay_t<Arg_>, madness::Future<Result_>>>* = nullptr) {
90  auto exec = [](Arg_&& arg) {
91  return static_cast<madness::Future<Result_>>(std::forward<Arg_>(arg));
92  };
93  return TiledArray::meta::invoke(exec, std::forward<Arg_>(arg));
94  }
95 
96  public:
100  template <typename Arg_, typename = std::enable_if_t<std::is_same<
101  argument_type, std::decay_t<Arg_>>::value>>
102  auto operator()(Arg_&& arg) const {
103  return this->invoker<result_type>(arg);
104  }
105 
106 }; // class Cast
107 
109 
118 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
119 class Cast<Result, Arg,
120  typename std::enable_if<
121  is_lazy_tile<Arg>::value &&
122  !std::is_same<Result, typename TiledArray::eval_trait<
123  Arg>::type>::value>::type> {
124  private:
125  typedef typename TiledArray::eval_trait<Arg>::type
126  eval_type;
127  typedef TiledArray::Cast<eval_type, Arg>
128  arg_to_eval_caster_type;
129  typedef TiledArray::Cast<Result, eval_type>
130  eval_to_result_caster_type;
131  public:
132  typedef Result result_type;
133  typedef Arg argument_type;
134 
136 
145  template <typename Arg_, typename = std::enable_if_t<std::is_same<
146  argument_type, std::decay_t<Arg_>>::value>>
147  auto operator()(Arg_&& arg) const {
148  arg_to_eval_caster_type cast_to_eval;
149  eval_to_result_caster_type cast_to_result;
150  return meta::invoke(cast_to_result, meta::invoke(cast_to_eval, arg));
151  }
152 
153 }; // class Cast
154 
155 } // namespace tile_interface
156 
158 
163 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Enabler>
164 class Cast : public TiledArray::tile_interface::Cast<Result, Arg, Enabler> {};
165 
170 template <typename Arg, typename Result = typename TiledArray::eval_trait<
171  std::decay_t<Arg>>::type>
172 auto invoke_cast(Arg&& arg) {
173  Cast<Result, std::decay_t<Arg>> cast;
174  return TiledArray::meta::invoke(cast, std::forward<Arg>(arg));
175 }
176 
177 } // namespace TiledArray
